movie.title: Finding the Funk
movie.description_intro: Finding the Funk is a road trip in search of the past, present and future of Funk music. Starting with Funk's roots in Jazz and the James Brown bands of the '60s we travel to the Bay Area to celebrate Sly & the Family Stone, then to Dayton the birthplace of so many of Funk's originators, then onto Detroit where from the ashes of Motown, P-Funk's Mothership arose, and then to LA where a new crop of musicians are creating their own Funk history. On our journey into Funk, we talk to legends Sly Stone, Bootsy Collins, George Clinton, Nona Hendryx, Maceo Parker, Bernie Worrell, and Steve Arrington and their descendants Mike D, D'Angelo, Sheila E, Shock G and Sade's Stuart Matthewman. Narrated by Ahmir 'Questlove' Thompson of the Roots.
movie.description_full: Finding the Funk is a road trip in search of the past, present and future of Funk music. Starting with Funk's roots in Jazz and the James Brown bands of the '60s we travel to the Bay Area to celebrate Sly & the Family Stone, then to Dayton the birthplace of so many of Funk's originators, then onto Detroit where from the ashes of Motown, P-Funk's Mothership arose, and then to LA where a new crop of musicians are creating their own Funk history. On our journey into Funk, we talk to legends Sly Stone, Bootsy Collins, George Clinton, Nona Hendryx, Maceo Parker, Bernie Worrell, and Steve Arrington and their descendants Mike D, D'Angelo, Sheila E, Shock G and Sade's Stuart Matthewman. Narrated by Ahmir 'Questlove' Thompson of the Roots.

movies.title: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions
movies.title_english: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions
movies.title_long: Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions (2020)
movies.summary: In "Folklore: The Long Pond Studio Sessions," Taylor Swift performs each song in order of her album, "folklore," and reveals the stories and secrets behind all 17 songs.

movies.title: Burning Ojai: Our Fire Story
movies.summary: Follows one family and the residents of Ventura County, CA through a journey of devastation, repair and survival after one of the largest wildfires in state history destroys their beloved community.
movies.description_full: Follows one family and the residents of Ventura County, CA through a journey of devastation, repair and survival after one of the largest wildfires in state history destroys their beloved community.
movies.synopsis: Follows one family and the residents of Ventura County, CA through a journey of devastation, repair and survival after one of the largest wildfires in state history destroys their beloved community.

movies.title: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value
movies.title_english: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value
movies.title_long: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value (1999)
movies.summary: A documentary examining the production of the album which turned Phil Collins into a solo star in 1981, spawning several heart-rending songs influenced both by his marital breakdown and love of soul music, as well as the huge hit single "In the Air Tonight".
movies.description_full: A documentary examining the production of the album which turned Phil Collins into a solo star in 1981, spawning several heart-rending songs influenced both by his marital breakdown and love of soul music, as well as the huge hit single "In the Air Tonight".
